name: The Virgin and Child with Saint Anne
maker: Master of James IV of Scotland
description: The Virgin and Child with Saint Anne; Master of James IV of Scotland (Flemish, before 1465 - about 1541); Bruges, Belgium; about 1510 - 1520; Tempera colors, gold, and ink on parchment; Leaf: 23.2 x 16.7 cm (9 1/8 x 6 9/16 in.); Ms. Ludwig IX 18, fol. 263v; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: The Virgin and Child with Saint Anne
medium: Tempera colors, gold, and ink on parchment
